summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganPlump, define, and contour with Kylie Cosmetics Plumping Lip Liner, an evolution of the best-selling, ultra-creamy lip liner pencil. This comfortable formula delivers a smudge free lip contour that lasts all day long without feathering or fading. It's a must-have for a fuller, precise lip.
details: DetailsBenefitsPlumps, defines, and contours lipsUltra-creamy texture seamlessly glides on the lipsColor stays put for up to 24 hours without smudging, feathering, or fadingLeaves lips visibly fullerComfortable to wearFormulated with Hot Flux® to help plump lipsClean, Gluten Free*Formulated with no ingredients from animal originItem 2631406How To UseApply this Kylie lip gloss to bare lips for an ultra-shiny, wash of perfect color, or layer over lipstick for a fuller-looking pout. Pair with your favorite lip liner pencil for a more defined look.IngredientsDimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Dicalcium Phosphate, Synthetic Wax, Phenylpropyldimethylsiloxysilicate, Polyethylene, Diisostearyl Fumarate, Glyceryl Tribehenate/Isostearate/Eicosandioate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Caprylyl Methicone, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Propylene Carbonate, Vanillyl Butyl Ether, Aluminum Hydroxide, Pentaerythrityl Tetra‐Di‐T‐Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Mica, Dictyopteris Polypodioides Extract, [+/-: Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Red 7 (Ci 15850)].|Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply this Kylie lip gloss to bare lips for an ultra-shiny, wash of perfect color, or layer over lipstick for a fuller-looking pout. Pair with your favorite lip liner pencil for a more defined look.

reviews.headline: Worst lipliner I have ever bought.
reviews.comments: How did this product get 4.5 stars? I couldnt even get it to adhere to my lips. The pencil color just broke up. Dont waste your money. What a rip off! kicking myself that i didnt return it back to the store for a refund!!!

reviews.headline: sooooooooo good get it bro
reviews.comments: it's so good, so buttery, yes a little pricey but the shades are natural and glide on so easy and lip liners last you a long time.

reviews.headline: Don't Waste your Money
reviews.comments: While I like the color, the design of the pencil is very poor. The mechanism wasn't working, so I got only two uses out of it.  As other users said, it is very dry on the lips.

reviews.headline: My favorite lip liner of all time
reviews.comments: This is my go to lip liner. Not only does it last a long time, but it applies smoothly and the color is perfect. I've tried the Anastasia, make up forever and other lip liners, and no one tops this one. I hope it is never discontinued.

reviews.headline: Recommend
reviews.comments: Love it, love the shade, and the plumping effect. Will definitely purchase again!

reviews.headline: Love this liner!
reviews.comments: This liner goes on smoothly and stays on even after eating. Love it!

reviews.headline: Perfect!
reviews.comments: Perfect lining plumper!! I've been looking for something like this FOREVER.

reviews.headline: Lovely Color
reviews.comments: Lovely color.. Risky Rose.. but with very little plumping compared to other brands I've used.

reviews.headline: AMAZING!
reviews.comments: I've struggle for years to find a lip liner that not only suits my pigmented lips but as a fair cool toned girly doesn't look too warm on my skin. Risky rose is quite literally the best lip liner I've ever found, it's absolutely perfect. Only thing I will say is there isn't a "plumping" affect which isn't why I personally bought it for in the first place, but if that's something your looking for, your not going to get that with this. Nonetheless it's perfect! (please come out with a fair cool toned pink lip liner!!!)

reviews.headline: MY FAVORITE EVER
reviews.comments: THIS IS THE ONLY REVIEW I'VE DONE ON HERE! I just have to say my favorite lip liner of all time ( shade coconut ) was out of stock EVERYWHERE FOR YEARS AND WHEN I SAW THEY BROUGHT IT BACK BEST BELIEVE I BOUGHT TWO!! and the formula that they updated for it is still so good it does feel tingly on the lips like if you ate something spicy lol, but i dont really get a plumping effect whatsoever but the creamy-ness and pigmentation of it is just perfect! best brown shade with subtle pink mix ever for my lips no other lip liners have the perfect nudes like her!!! i will get buried with this liner one day. yes it is this serious!!

reviews.headline: Great Color
reviews.comments: I love the color and it's easy to apply. I don't get a plumping feeling but the liner itself stays on a long time. Don't forget to buy a sharpener lol!

media.headline: Kylie Lip Liner - LOVE the color
media.caption: Kylie shade lip liner!

media.headline: I really like it. Perfect pink nude
media.caption: This is a six hour difference between pictures without any retouch even had lunch in those hours too.

faceoff_positive.comments: Love this liner, it goes on so smoothly. Can't decide if I like these ones or the wooden ones more. Keep in mind the coconut color is very similar to the precision pout coconut color, but not identical!
faceoff_positive.headline: Smooth application, long-wearing

faceoff_negative.comments:
I will start off by saying the packaging in pink is really cute.

Now let's get real: I don't understand why Kylie's products are so overrated.

As a professional makeup artist I think this lip liner is far from extraordinary. However it has a nice vanilla scent to it which is something that I would least care about.

Longevity would be my first concern especially when it comes to lip liners; waterproof feature would be second.

Obviously colors, pigment and texture are important too - this one has a good amount of pigment, but the fact that the texture is so creamy would cancel the long-lasting effect, in my opinion. I could easily rub it off with my fingers without putting too much effort. Also because the texture is so creamy it glides nicely, but it does not apply a solid even streak.

I would definitely not purchase this for my professional kit or my personal.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not impressed
